title: Corvus Robotics (YC S18) is hiring robotics QA/DevOps engineer
description: Hi! We're building autonomous aerial robots to help industrial clients track inventory. We're looking for a DevOps/release/QA engineer to work closely with our amazing autonomy development team. This person would start PART-TIME, obviously remote, and after t…
